title: Ruling on hanging Ma sha Allah, Allahumma barik, Qul Surahs or any dua - Assim al hakeem
transcript: the issue of writing masha allah or these kinds of dua what is the purpose of writing them the vast majority of people would say so that people would not give us an evil eye so they write on their big mansions again this is like a an amulet like a whis and this is not permissible okay if i did not have this intention then this is an innovation you should not even do it in the first place and allah azza knows best
